technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.

communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation with her partner and asked questions, but did not give affirmations.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversed with her partner.
defensiveness: The participant did not display any defensive behaviors.
